price: Allah ile birlikte bir başka ilah edinme! Yoksa, kınanmış ve terkedilmiş olursun.
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fataqʿuda madhmūman makhdhūlan
